title: Thank you Riot for Neeko
body:
Thank you Riot for Neeko, I love this Girl and her Kit.

I like to play Zyra, Morgana and old Katarina and she just perfectly fits in my Rooster.

She's lovely naiv, i like it every time she speaks its like Unicorns on Rainbows, thats shes lesbian is so nice, sexy and modern too.

I have alot of fun to play her.

I hope you make in the near future cool Skin where she fits perfectly in, like Star Guardian Neeko i couldnt stop myself from overhyping.

{{sticker:sg-jinx}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Kata Ga Kill,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-12-21T09:48:49.095+0000)
>
> thats shes lesbian is so nice, sexy and modern too.

But isn't that the case for every gender and orientation? For example, the fact that I'm a straight man is nice, sexy, and modern too, right?

Right?

I'm enjoying neeko as well. idk why it is that people have such a problem with mages dealing a lot of dmg but AD champs are fine to deal a ton of dmg.

Not to mention her escape options are limited. E if you can land it or press w and hope they chase the clone.

> [{quoted}](name=AR URF,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-21T18:13:07.837+0000)
>
> I'm enjoying neeko as well. idk why it is that people have such a problem with mages dealing a lot of dmg but AD champs are fine to deal a ton of dmg.
> 
> Not to mention her escape options are limited. E if you can land it or press w and hope they chase the clone.

People complain about damage as a whole. Neeko has too much power stuffed into that kit. That root duration is too high considering the fact it goes through minions and gets stronger as it goes through them, plus the damage on that ult is absurd considering you can't even see the windup and it's uninterruptible. If a champion's only real drawback is the lack of reliable mobility, you fucked up somewhere.

> [{quoted}](name=Refer A Friend 1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-12-21T21:36:16.260+0000)
>
> People complain about damage as a whole. Neeko has too much power stuffed into that kit. That root duration is too high considering the fact it goes through minions and gets stronger as it goes through them, plus the damage on that ult is absurd considering you can't even see the windup and it's uninterruptible. If a champion's only real drawback is the lack of reliable mobility, you fucked up somewhere.
 
She gets slowed down when she winds up.

Now, the Cute Champ aside:

Slow
Root
Stun
Shield
Indirect Skillshot
MS Boost
Invis
Clones
Clones alllies
MASSIVE DAMAGE
Warp
Doubled Damage
Built In Lich Bane - stacks with lichbane
3 Escape Mechanisms.

Yeah, no, some designer didn't just cram every ounce of champion into her.

> [{quoted}](name=Cats Are Food,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-12-21T18:13:19.089+0000)
>
> Now, the Cute Champ aside:
> 
> Slow
> Root
> Stun
> Shield
> Indirect Skillshot
> MS Boost
> Invis
> Clones
> Clones alllies
> MASSIVE DAMAGE
> Warp
> Doubled Damage
> Built In Lich Bane - stacks with lichbane
> 3 Escape Mechanisms.
> 
> Yeah, no, some designer didn't just cram every ounce of champion into her.

I'd love to know her 3 escape mechanisms....... Indulge me.

- Stealth (Hard Escape)
- Duck around a corner, and clone an ally with far more health (Soft Escape that works most of the time as the enemy peels away)
- Ult while moving away (Hard Escape)

As someone who has played Shaco for nearly a decade, this chick is -easy- to get away from danger with.

Next question?

> [{quoted}](name=Cats Are Food,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-12-22T02:55:17.942+0000)
>
> - Stealth (Hard Escape)
> - Duck around a corner, and clone an ally with far more health (Soft Escape that works most of the time as the enemy peels away)
> - Ult while moving away (Hard Escape)
> 
> As someone who has played Shaco for nearly a decade, this chick is -easy- to get away from danger with.
> 
> Next question?

You didn't answer my question. She has one brief mobility, and Any player worth their salt isn't going to fall for the 3 second clone who doesn't even attack.

She doesn't have a Stealth. I don't know where you get that she does lol. She "Vanishes" for a half a second while casting W, but that keeps her in place.

Have you even ATTEMPTED to escape using her R? The Stun only lasts 1.25 seconds max.. Most of the time it does nothing at all to gain distance, because when it's actually casting, IT STOPS HER FROM MOVING. Any champ whose actually chasing her..... should have enough gap closers in their kits to compensate for whatever small distance it makes.

You're basically arguing that any champ that has multiple CC's is broken, and has "escape mechanisms"
You asked a question, I gave you the answers.  Just because you can't use them properly doesn't mean anything to me.

> [{quoted}](name=Cats Are Food,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2018-12-22T02:55:17.942+0000)
>
> - Stealth (Hard Escape)
> - Duck around a corner, and clone an ally with far more health (Soft Escape that works most of the time as the enemy peels away)
> - Ult while moving away (Hard Escape)
> 
> As someone who has played Shaco for nearly a decade, this chick is -easy- to get away from danger with.
> 
> Next question?

Are u serious?
If ure ganked and u clone somone with more HP, they will not know and stop???????
Ult isnt a escape too, because before the Ult starts, she stuns herself hard 1 sec jumping in the air, in this position youre pretty fucked up.

Sry Boy i dont call hitting Iron Dudes with Ult as a great Escape.
It's... weird. Every time I've played her, I have had absolutely no trouble using all three as escapes. One is variable, but the other two always seem to manage an escape.

I feel like she is fun to play and i also like her VO but i honestly think she is just garbage tier atm. I feel like she will end up being another competetive use only champ like kalista. In pro play she might work with coordinated teams but solo q she is just bad.

>she just perfectly fits in my Rooster.

She fits your Rooster.. Hmm what kind of 

>Rooster

I bet it was this kind https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/8/8c/Rooster03.jpg


Serious note: She's pretty fun. I can't wait to see what kind of skins she gets.  I personally want a Definitely Not Neeko
Definitely Not Neeko would be absolutely adorable and I'd have to have it... I'd never USE it, I'd be ashamed, but I'd have to have it.
Neeko is an abomination and should have never made it to live.

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-21T18:09:11.027+0000)
>
> Neeko is an abomination and should have never made it to live.

They rejected his message.

They hated SnugglePuggle94 for he told them the fricking truth.

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4ctrEQG5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-21T18:09:11.027+0000)
>
> Neeko is an abomination and should have never made it to live.

Lmao someone makes a completely positive post, it gets downvoted, then someone comments the exact opposite and it gets upvoted. Perfect example of the boards.
